name: Demon House
description:
Wendy is a young woman who moves into the home of a mentally unstable woman who died from cancer recently. She soon meets her neighbour Kusuhara and weird things begin to happen in the house that make Wendy question her sanity.

What are the secrets of the demon house? What is Kusuhara hiding? What happened to Miss Jenner? Find out...

Demon House is a 15 minute long rpg horror with 4 endings.
